document_data.name: Maeraddyth Starym
document_data.mainbody: '''Maeraddyth Starym''' was an inhabitant of [[Myth Drannor]] in the 3{{rd}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: On {{yearlink|261}}, Maeraddyth Starym barged in on the [[Starym]] scrying on the court when [[Llombaerth Starym]] attempted to slay [[Coronal]] [[Eltargrim]] and failed. Though he cried for the Coronal's blood, he was talked down by [[Uldreiyn Starym]].
